title: Cardi B Promises Pregnancy Won’t Affect Her Upcoming Tour: ‘I’ll Be Doing Splits, Somersaults’
summary: The rapper recently revealed she's expecting her first child with Stefon Diggs.
body: Cardi B ‘s announcement that she and boyfriend Stefon Diggs are expecting a baby came as a big shock to fans, especially because the rapper had revealed plans to embark on a rigorous tour just one day prior. Related Cardi B Reveals She’s Expecting Fourth Child: ‘Now Y’all Could Buy My Album So I Can Buy Pampers!’ Cardi B Announces 30-Date 2026 North American Arena Tour In Support of ‘Am I the Drama?’ Album Cardi B Reveals She Almost Fell Asleep During Her Assault Trial, Teases Tour News ‘Coming Soon’ But in an X post on Wednesday (Sept. 17) — just hours after her pregnancy reveal on CBS Mornings — Cardi assured her fans that her pregnancy won’t affect her performance abilities when it comes time to hit the road in February. “Thank you everybody for the love and support,” the musician began. “By the time tour comes I’ll be doing splits, somersaults backflips and handstands,” she continued. “I want this really bad and I’m on a very strict plan … trust me I’m determined to give my fans the best album AND tour experience!!” The message comes one day after Ca…

title: Order the Eater Guide to Mexico City, Our Newest Travel Guide
summary: In 2017, Eater published its first travel package dedicated to an international destination — and it should surprise no one that it focused on Mexico City, where stellar meals, snacks, and sips engulf the 570-square-mile metropolis. title: Eater Wins Silver Medal From the Society of American Travel Writers
summary: Today, the University of Missouri School of Journalism announced the winners of its 2025 Lowell Thomas Travel Journalism Competition, overseen and funded by the Society of American Travel Writers Foundation. Eater was awarded a silver medal in the Special Packages/Series category for its multi-face…
